item.title: Cameron Boozer Scores 29 to help Duke Stave off Florida's Comeback Effort
item.description: Isaiah Evans hit a go-ahead 3-pointer with 19.7 seconds left, and No. 4 Duke held on to beat No. 15 Florida 67-66 in the ACC/SEC Challenge
